results.name: Dungeons and Dragons: The Rise of Warduke

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10.
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card 2gb
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10.
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 3.2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card 3gb
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
